description: This vegan falafel pizza is made with spicy harissa-spiked tomato sauce, roasty-toasty onions and bell peppers, and creamy tahini sauce.
name: Vegan Falafel Pizza
recipeIngredient: 1 small red bell pepper, (sliced into strips)
1 tsp. granulated sugar, (or sweetener of choice)
about 1 cup arugula or baby spinach

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400Â°. Line a baking sheet with parchment and brush lightly with olive oil.
Place all falafel ingredients into food processor bowl and pulse until well blended.

Roll mixture into 1 inch balls and arrange on baking sheet. The mixture will be soft and delicate, but you should be able to roll it. If it seems too soft, sprinkle in a few panko breadcrumbs. Flatten balls slightly and brush tops with olive oil. Bake 30 minutes, flipping halfway through, until browned on both sides.
